summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Water Department; authorizing and accepting Easement Agreements with Valley View Industrial Park, a Joint Venture, and with Puget Sound Power and Light Company, a Washington corporation, and accepting easements over Section 2, and Section 3, ALL in Township 25 North, Range 5 East, W.M., AND Section 35, Township 26 North, Range 5 East, W.M., King County, Washington, for water supply pipeline, patrol/maintenance road and lateral support/slope purposes. (Tolt Pipeline (TPL) \#2, Phase I)
